title: How to place a bid
content: To place a bid, go to the item page, click “Place Bid,” enter your offer, and confirm. You’ll see your bid on the auction timer until it closes.

title: Managing your account
content: In the Profile section you can update your personal info, change your password, set notification preferences, and connect social accounts.

title: Payment methods
content: We accept Visa, MasterCard, Amex, PayPal, and direct bank transfer. You can add or remove payment methods under Settings → Payment.

title: Contact support
content: Need help? Fill out our Contact form or email support@example.com. Our team replies within 24 hours on business days.

title: FAQ
content: Browse frequently asked questions on bidding, shipping, payments, and account management right here.

title: Terms & Conditions
content: Our Terms & Conditions cover usage rules, privacy, and your rights. Please read them carefully before placing bids.
